title: Collaborative Mobile Microlearning Design for Strengthening Mathematical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of College-Level Basic Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: Supporting large-scale learners and operating summative assessment-centric programs in limited-technology environments (no PCs, smartphone-dominant).

learning_goals: Learners can apply math problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy in mobile environments
Learners can participate in a self-directed process of improving learning content through peer feedback
Learners can build collaborative learning environments using at least three digital tools (quiz apps, collaboration platforms, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
